content: Needs balance.

Just beat normal mode. Awesome game for focused sessions, because you can complete the game quickly enough (in ~1h). Keeps you engaged throughout the campaign and rewards replays. There's a variety of things that can happen during your journey, so you need to adapt and use your wit to get through all obstacles. Art direction and atmosphere are very pleasing. Gameplay during battles is quite basic but engaging, and requires you to think a bit. I wish there was some kind of endless mode.
Fantastic

Very polished, fun rogue-lite game. I like the touches like dialogue between characters. Pretty glitchless too, the only one I saw was that one of the confirmation boxes had Korean dialogue (at victory screen). The game is hard and theres little progression except your skill at the game. But, that's in line with the genre and was a positive for me. The rng is reasonable though sometimes bad luck will end your run.

This game is really amazing. I've played it through so many times already and I haven't gotten bored. I love the randomness of everything, keeps it fresh. Each play through requires you to adapt to what you have. I can't say enough good things about this game. More like this PLEASE.
Great rouge like, just hard enough to keep you coming back for more!
Amazing!!Needs to be a tiny bit easier because i get to level 8 but run out of army/potion.. UODATE:It definitely needs to be easier theres no reason i shouldn't of beaten it at least once by now

Very enjoyable. There is a surprising amount of variety in the gameplay despite what initially appears to be a straightforward format. Rewards replays and there's a good range of characters, factions and enemies to keep it interesting. Well worth the money.
Absolutely amazing, the only note I have is to add more events and characters into the mix! Everything else is perfect üëå
Super fun game with high as hell replayability

Nice design but a little too bleak and unrewarding. Challenging in the same way raising a family on a shoestring budget is challenging. Upped it to4 stars as I underestimated it...Further edit. Its a slow grower upped to 5‚≠ê
Super fun game. I wish there were a way to comand the front knights movements. Also wish i could resign a knight so that i can replace them with better ones sometimes in citys.
Difficult
Really good game Different and interesting Enjoyed the story Maybe make the unique stuff more useful or interesting....
I really enjoy the replayability this game has! Very entertaining, and surprisingly difficult!
Pretty great already with the player being able to choose some things but this could be expanded.

Very fun game. Hope there's more heroes/events added eventually. I really like the variety there is now. Maybe change the flame charge guy a bit? Every time i use him as melee he rushes into the midst of 40 enemies and dies. Maybe I'm just using him wrong.

A rogue like strategy game with high replay value, where every playthrough is always different. I love that this game challenged me, and this game is difficult, but I encouraged myself to keep replaying it and learn from my mistakes. After countless playthroughs, I finally 100% this game, and I have to say, for a mobile game made by a small group, I got more depth from this compared to a triple A title and my time was worth invested. I do play games for the story, and I love that I learned more and more about the lore each time I played it. Even small things like conversations between your party members I appreciate. And the setting is very dark and bleak, and best represents the story and whats at stake at the end. If you're looking for something with easy and mindless fun, this game is not for you. But if you want a game with a deeper story and a game that challenges yourself, then try Unknown Knights. Thank you teamarex for making a great game.
Its ok. You don't really seem to upgrade anything where you do better the next game. So it's like the same thing over and over, I just get farther sometimes by chance.

I wanted to love the game it has some amazing ideas and passion but needs some serious balance there is zero reason why ticking off the assassins takes out all of your militia resources from villages and etc it's not even realistic if that's the purpose even on easy it's the same kind or punishment, the devs need to lighten the consequences for both the guards and assassins. Also the progression is boring all you get is to start with a little extra the game isnt all that rewarding. Very flawed.
Make like 15 tower to destroy make more event plz
Game is legit goodtimes and super replayable!
Great game.
Greetings and Felicitations... This game is Awesome! In High def the graphics are beautifully done, feeling and thought evoking? Holds.my interest indefinitely! What's next? Thank you

The amount of fun I have had with this game is phenomenal. Very FTL-esque in its style of the journey through the story with many branching paths, bosses and stories to make (Will you bend to the will of the assassins, or let the corrupt Royal Guards hound the downtrodden and poor?). The fact that it is without ads or an iota of any login bonuses or microtransactions is a testament to the developers and the vision delivered here. Cannot wait to see more content / other games from this developer

This game is incredibly fun, so far I haven't discovered any glitches so that's good. I do feel like they should've added a load button to load saves BUT they may not want there game to have that so it's still getting 5 stars. But yeah it's really fun, has a lot of strategy in it like deciding if you want to make everyone hate you and get more rewards or not. I've been playing the game for 3 hours straight now and I'm having a lot of fun so I would definitely recommend it.
The video looks really dope and I wish I could play but everytime I start it up it never makes it past initializing. It just crashes after that. Still think it's a cool looking game though
replyContent: We're sorry about the issue. To support the issue, we checked your phone and found out it's Nokia 1.3. Unfortunately, your phone is one of the models we couldn't afford to test our game on. If you mail us at teamarex0help@gmail.com, we may find other ways to help you. Thank you.

content: Great game worth every penny. Challenging, fun and keeps you interested. Keep up good work. Can't wait for your next game.
Fantastically addicting. Depth on a variety of levels. Difficult in a good way. Massive replayability.
Very nice, needs some more encounters and variety
Amazing game
Solid game with lots of replay value. Well worth the low price.
Such an interesting game. I've played through it quite a few times and I'm still enjoying it.
This is my favorite mobile game it was cheap well-made no ads or microtransactions 100% worth the price.
Used to be 5 but all my data seems to be gone when I reinstalled
Superb, polished FTL-like gameplay with surprisingly intense real time battles involved. Ann excellent story and world building underneath that I was not expecting. Massively recommended

Fun most of the time. Heavily based on luck. One bad battle can ruin an entire game. So bennet now actually picks up extra mithril now. I won't start any game with Potter or Jane. Jane finds one place and then becomes completely useless once inside. Potter......good for nothing. You don't get rewarded for evading battle. I basically have to restart the game on average like ten times to get a decent combination of starting knights. Update. You were right about the miner.
replyContent: Thank you for playing and review! Some tips for you. In fact, Miner is pretty useful 'cause you can get more Mythril in the mine with him. That makes a difference later in the game. 3/5 of Top five rankers picked him. According to their play log their strategy is to upgrade fast, win the battle with good control, hire knights later. Hope you enjoy!

content: Great mood and entertaining gameplay. Original concept. A bit dark in a good way.
Nice gameplay. Very memory heavy for what it is though. And takes a while to load. But, enjoyable gameplay, and replayability .

It's fun, it really is. I like the events a lot too. The rng isn't awful, but everything is so dang costly and the game is so difficult even on easy mode. I just really don't know if I could ever do remotely well in this game.

A fun challenging game with replayability. It's a good choice for people with low spec devices that can't handle action. The player goes from place to place involving scenarios that have lasting impact. The combat is real time strategy in commanding when to attack, defend, and parry. The troops move to their targets on their own unless they're defending. Side note for dev: the relic cave in chapter five has "piwerful" spelled in the description.
I love this game. Can't even count the times I've played through it

A very fun game that you just have to get used to. You wont beat everything first go and you have to learn the benefits of each character and what situations have the best outcome. Give it some time and you will steam role certain outcomes
I like traditional strategy games and this combines strategy with a choose your own adventure model. It's fun and replayable
An amazing game that the world needs to play, a sequel is absolutely in order here! = D Keep up the awesome work you guys.
love it
One of the best Roguelike mobile games I've played. I really enjoy the story, the controls, everything.

Hard ruins it. Or specifically, the final battle on hard ruins it. It is unforgiving and literally impossible unless you have a full amount of militia and soldiers making the hour you spent to get there wasted. It honestly ruins the experience. Also once you have beaten it once you have seen it all other than unlocking relics and scenarios.

Overall I feel this game is straight forward and it requires several play throughs to get the hang of things. While easy and normal are pretty simple to get through, I feel like hard mode is more or less a nightmare of a time. You will sacrifice knights and items just to get by, and sure you might win in the end, but those achievements are ridiculous to get to.

Pretty fun game, had a glitch where I was given a quest to kill a white archer, however the place I was supposed to do it at was at an area I had already passed by. It may have something to do with the fact I was at the last point before a dark tower.
Baaaaaad

Save points dont work properly if I get killed and try to go back to the previous save point to try a different choice the game forces a save when I try to go back. What's the point of having a save point if I cant use them. I have the same complaint game is very hard even in easy. Fatigue levels are nasty as well if and if you take to long to win more enemies endlessly spawn potions are too expensive geeze guys what the hell are you thinking making this so punitive?
Damn, this is really addictive.

I don't usually rate games but this game is worth it. This game is very well made and polished. I was easily able to understand the mechanics and jump into the game. There are no text walls explaining how to play (Thank you!!)The game is challenging but at no point is it unfair or punishing. Whenever I died, it was always my fault.I thought I could cheese my way through the game with a single build but with random maps, I have to think about what paths to take and how that will affect what I do!

Very very good game i beat normal mode and now im going for expert mode i loved everything about it would love to see a 2 with even more story lines and larger maps with even more surprises along the game with numerous paths to follow and with even larger fightable armys cant wait to see thrilling game that really goes in depth with role-playingüíú

I been seeing this app in playstore for as while now and i was hesitant on buying it even after i read all the positive reviews, even had it on my wishlist and im glad that i bought this game. Its worth the money. Def a 5 star game

Thank you"DEVS" for responding but it was not your game that was causing the problem it was google play store it works now because I contacted google threatening them with a lawsuit for blaming one of its supporters Google play was the culprit not unknown knights great game hope I can be apart of keeping these "devs" in the clear from fraudulent blame from Google play store
replyContent: Sorry for your inconvenience. We didn't intend the situation you experienced and the problem didn't occured in our internal test. We'll check there's anything we can do about it but we need more detailed information to support you. Please email us at teamarex0help@gmail.com

content: Good and addicting fun for hours
Surprisingly gripping for a few days. Atmospheric, strategic, great sense of balance and choice. Not my style of game but I liked it for what it is
Very cool roguelike progression game. Wish there were more persistent upgrades, but very fun as is
Alot of fun would be nice to see a few more additions
Trash.

A fantastic roguelike, similar to FTL, Darkest Dungeon, and Bad North. You basically start with a squad and try to survive your way through 10 randomly generated maps full of random encounters and events. I love how optimised the game and the UI are for phones, it really makes it easy to pick up and play. The combat is just deep enough without getting too cumbersome on a phone UI. I'd love to see more content added like more random encounters and new characters and enemies.
This game is insane, the gameplay is phenomenal and the different characters and abilities go hand in hand so well that it makes it that much better, I recommend the download

The game does not always register that you have relics, heroes, or potions. Specifically, the relics are sometimes unable to be activated, heroes passives do not proc regardless of combat or area relation, and potions cannot be used in combat occasionally. Please fix.
Had it on the iPhone and because it's such a damn good game I bought it on here as well
Legit

This exactly the game I've been looking for. I love it! Anyone who's played FTL will most likely like this game. it sorta hits the same notes. I'd say it feels like what LotR would be like as a Rouge-like game. The battle mechanics are different from FTL but it is also an encounter based kind of game. The thing I like is the way the devs stretch out these encounters to become these detailed side quests. It also has a darkest dungeon kind of vibe.. just not as depressing, lol. Please make more!!
Well designed, balanced game with great replay value.
You think it is ethical to collect and sell your customer's personal data, including location information? This is never going to be okay.
replyContent: 'Unknown Knights' saves user's play data as a log to use for balancing, prevention hacking and debugging. But we never collect sensitive personal data. So it's impossible to identify an individual from the data. We use analysis modules of Unity, Firebase, and Facebook. To use those modules, we have to get user consent. Thank you for playing.

content: Like others have said, no BS, no ads, totally worth it. This is an oddly addicting game. Varied, simplistic on the surface, but man! Talk about rolling the dice when decision making. Resource and real-time power management (in combat) is thrilling! When you gaff it up, the baddies hammer you hard, and best of all, it's basically always your own damn fault. Outstanding!
Fun cool experience

In one word? Awesome. The combat is easy to learn, but challenging to master. The choices are great too. Choosing which Knights to bring along your adventure is always tough because there's not a bad one.
Fun and challenging

This is actually a solid game. One of the few mobile games out there that is worth every penny. Honestly wish more games on the mobile market were as high quality as this one. Game play wise, it is an adventure game with simple yet tactical combat. The rougelike elements are interesting and keep you going through runs to get stronger and unlock more content. Not really much of a story, just a lot of lore given through chance encounters. But it is unique in its own way. Overall a 10/10 game.
Spot on.
Great RPG with strategy elements. Always loved games like these and they did it perfectly. Also, knights vs. Zombies

The game is fantastic in every way. There is so much replayability. Can be a bit repetitive and sometimes you will get a playthrough that sucks but that is the game. Every decision you make has an impact. Looking forward to what the devs release next!
Thanks for your support

Amazing game, seems simple on the surface but once you actually play for a few levels, you realize that there is a lot of strategy involved. Has a small story line to it, would have appreciated more fleshing out, but very good overall.
Decent just wasnt that fun for me
Your terms of service does NOT need our browsers info, history, our location and web browser activities. Thats too personal. I do not accept and am uninstalling.
replyContent: 'Unknown Knights' saves user's play data as a log to use for balancing, prevention hacking and debugging. But we never collect sensitive personal data. So it's impossible to identify an individual from the data. We use analysis modules of Unity, Firebase, and Facebook. To use those modules, we have to get user consent. Thank you for playing.

content: Amazing game honestly, somewhat similiar in idea to ftl or slay the spire.
Very fun, randomness keeps the feeling fresh. Love the art style.
Amazing Game! I really hope this game gets the attention it deserves now that it is apart of play pass! Wonderful job teamarex!

Absolutely worth every penny and then some. Very challenging and additional encounters/bosses are unlocked as you get farther in, keeping the game interesting. Combines strategic thinking with planning, creativity, and also requires good reflex/skill control to pass through battles relatively unharmed. Play again and again, learning from experience, and finally succeed in clearing the various difficulties and bosses. The replayability of this game cannot be understated. Very highly recommend!

By mobile game standards, this is masterpiece. Buy it if you like games and wish they made good ones for mobile. I hope it continues to see development and balancing to make recurring playthroughs less frustrating.
Unique and beautiful!

Absolutely love this game. Interesting story, decent interactions and the combat system is very much One of those "minute to learn, forever to master" type deals. Only drawback is that it is a tad buggy. Occasionally certain letters of words in the menus are just not there. Also, and this was a little gamebreaking for me: [SPOILERS] The game doesn't progress after I defeat the royal guards trying to get me to meet the great wizard. Dialogue appears, but then the game does not continue.

This game has wonderful characterisation and theme, a perfect blend of gameplay mechanics, a well-tuned difficulty curve, great replayability, and is a true gamer's game (rather than a money or popularity grab). In fact it has probably snuck its way into my top five all-time android games. Just a tip for new players: if you have trouble at first, or feel like it is overly random or impossible, just keep at it, and you'll be surprised how consistently good you can perform.

I highly recommend this game, its fun, quiet challenging and has quite a bit of incredibly fun scenarios to run into Like the time I delved into a forgotten mine and all of my knights were murdered because I was so caught up in the absurdity that is giant murder slugs that I didnt realise the insane amount of damage it was doing It's great. Multiple playthroughs in and am still running into new scenarios/challenges. Highly recommend you try this game.

Wonderful game. Happy to support such a great experience. You okay a knight working their way across the land, recruiting others, and leaving your mark across a world. This game has replayability for days on end, a wonderful evolving story dependent on your decisions, phenomenal music, and an attractive art direction. Do yourself a favor, get this gem of a game that has stayed on my phone while other games have been deleted and forgotten. Thank you, Devs.
Awesome game
Nice
Enjoyable! Repayable! Amathing! Buy it if you have not done it yet!
Fantastic game. Well worth the price.
Game good
Excellent, challenging game with great replayability: expert seems impossible at first but well balanced gameplay.
One of the top games on Android
Come on guys, why did you only make one game
The mini bosses are a nice touch keeps me wanting to play
Fun, worth the money
So far so good...downloaded it a few hours ago and i am hooked. I love the RPG meets choose your adventure type scenario
Love the game but recently changed phone to a pixel 4 and now it won't install correctly and freezes on launch
replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. It seems there's a crash that occurred between Android OS and Playstore during your installation. Please e-mail us at teamarex0help@gmail.com we can guide you on how to fix the issue.

content: I bought this yesterday and I'm really enjoying it. If you're a fan of FTL you will probably like this.

Chose this as a game to keep me awake while holding my newborn. It has been excellent. Challenging, but fair. Interesting variety and choices. Well worth the price. Reminds me of FTL, but with quick encounters so you can get lots of gameplay in. Equally good for short, interrupted sessions or a two hour epic. Music reminds me of the original Diablo. I'll be watching this developer, they are doing the Lord's work.
At first I was a little hesitant on getting this game but I was wrong and it was worth it
Great game! It has a story line easy to follow, you can pick your party of knights and each play threw is different! Can't put it down!

I think this game just isn't for me. It doesn't seem to keep my attention, gets kinda boring after playing through the first level because it's repetitive and more of a strategy\puzzle game than an rpg, in what i would consider an rpg to be.

Update: this is a creation of rare elegance and subtle beauty. The layering of complex decision-making over what appears to be a simple framework is impressive. Great atmospheric game with tough choices and roller coaster ups and downs. Lots of depth! Reminds me why I don't like slugs, too.

Really enjoy this game. Plays very similar to Faster Than Light(FTL). Easy to start and difficult to finish. Worth the price. Wish they would add more events and randomized outcomes(though there are plenty, more is always better) Edit: the game keeps surprising you even after you finish it. Plenty of replayability.
I don't know why, But I love this game. Difficult, but not excruciatingly so. Neat choices. Neat presentation. More like this please.

YES, I've waited for something like this for Android. It has that FTL feeling and replayability and a unique style. Here's hoping for many more updates! (Request: naming your characters would be a nice touch) :)

Absolutely fantastic! Played for my 4th time today and finally got to the final tower! I lost unfortunately. However with the gameplay, story choices, etc. I got to go down as a hero in all the towns and villages, and I felt great about it. It was a rush, and I'll be playing it a 5th time hoping to beat the final tower as I finish this review. Would love to see more Knights, Allies, Enemies in the future! - Feb 20th 2020

I wanted to give you guys a review y'all deserve by playing for longer than I usually would before reviewing games. So with a few days (maybe 20 hours total or something) I want to finally give it my review. First things, The game itself is very smooth, no game-ending bugs, simple yet challenging mechanics. Second, for the price point it's at, I can wholeheartedly say there is not a game more worth in the market than this. And finally, this game is HARD. But I love it. Keep up the great work!

Great little game that I have sunk far too much time into! Small cost is offset by not having it sit thought a 30s add every other minute. Gameplay is fun and you have a fair few different strategies available to you and so far each playthrough has been very different. The expert mode is a good test!

Love the game, however I wish sleeping at an Inn also restored health, doesn't have to be a significant amount but some kind of offset for potions. Resting at the faire pond, and NPC houses can still reduce fatigue. But an Inn should restore a portion of health. Beyond that, love the game. For new players, never be afraid to dump mythril into defense abilities and just staying on defense and firing shock arrows to buy time until you can retreat.

A surprisingly good game with unexpected tons of variability. I was very happy with this game despite some initial apprehension. Not only is there tons to do but there is a surprising amount of depth and consequence to your choices.

I really love the aesthetics and idea, however after playing for a week, I find this game to be incredibly difficult and very dependent upon your initial knight pulls. I have yet to beat it on anything but easy and have decided to give up.
replyContent: Thank you for playing! Here are some tips for you in case you want to try it again later. Collect Gold first and hire Knights as many as you can instead of using up your money buying potions or soldiers. (You can gather your soldiers free in Refugee Camp.) And upgrade arrows. These are the most common strategy by far. Hope you can enjoy the game.

content: Man, it is nice to find a game like this in the 'Play Store! Unique in its visual aesthetic and the play style pays a fantasy set homage to FTL, a perfect combination. Well worth the price of purchase with the amount of experimentation and replayability. I have been letting my teammates in my Battlegroup try it out while we're on duty so I hope more of us dumb "Jarheads" buy this gem of creative programming. Thanks for your hard work 'Devs and I hope success and good fortune favors you!
replyContent: Thank you for playing and kind words! It's really happy to hear that you feel that way because we're also a big fan of FTL. And what you did means a lot to us because for indie devs like us, it's getting harder and harder to promote the game these days. We're very appreciative. We'll keep updating the game to make improvements. Have a great day!

content: Amazing. Can't believe that I got all this content, plus no ads and no in app purchases, for the price I paid. I've probably put 6-7 hours in the last few days, not a single one playthrough has felt the same. Its got some difficulty to it, and a lot of random encounters keep the game feeling fresh. One of the few games that I've felt is well worth the price. I am getting a new phone soon and this is the first game I'm going to buy and download on it.
replyContent: Thank you for playing and great review! :D Glad to hear that you felt the game worth the price. I hope all the things in the game work well on your new phone too. FYI, We made a subreddit(r/unknownknights), and uploaded some tips for you. If you have anything to share, please visit. Have a great day!

content: Great game so far. On my third play through so far but have found myself bugged. EDIT: I was able to resolve it by using a revive artifact. None of my knights were red or had an exclamation mark ( ! ) above their heads. Normally i would also get a prompt asking if i wanted to let them die before travelling but this did not occur. The arrows point in two directions but neither the arrows nor the destinations they pointed to could be selected. Still seems like a bug, lucky i had an artifact!
replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. When you at a fork, you should choose where to go first(Orange Arrows), then the Travel button will be available. If that doesn't help, please try this: 1. Go to [CONFIG] on the main screen - [Patch Data Again]. Then START the game again. Please mail us teamarex0@help@gmail.com if you need detailed support. Thank you!

content: Edit:devs listen and I noticed tips on loading. Thanks for such an awesome game!
replyContent: Thank you for playing. Loading tips pop up based on where you die. If you died because of slugs the tips about slugs should pop up. But some battles are mixed with different monsters. In that case, the tips will be picked randomly among monster types on the battlefield where you died. About the leaderboard, we're working on it. Have a great day!

content: Game is alot of luck, very little skill. Had 3 runs in a row where I was destroyed by bad luck. Had an entire army set up, died because level 9 had 1 resting place at the beginning so my knights fatigued to death the whole way, or got swarmed by one super bad luck event after another, or were assaulted by a massive 3 part wave of slugs, exploders and 20 archers. Not saying its bad, certaily fun, but way too much luck involved.
replyContent: Thank you for playing and review! Here are some tips. Actually, managing fatigue is mostly up to you, not just luck. Make sure that your army is not too tired before getting into the next chapter. Chapter 9 has always at least TWO resting places 'cause there's always a village or castle. Hiring Ramsey is also helpful to recover the tiredness.

content: All of a sudden the app asks for permissions to access photos then continues to crash when loading. Game is unplayable now. Edit: Fixed with the latest update.
replyContent: Thank you for trying the solution. Please enjoy!

content: Looks like much fun.

game is hard as hell even if I put it on easy I still get my butt kick it I try over and over and still get killed every time what a waste of a game just doesn't make no sense Im not a rpg fan anyway Im pretty sure no one plays this.
Congratulations on reaching number 1. I can tell you guys put in a lot of hard work into this game and you definitely deserve this spot :)
replyContent: Thank you for playing. It seems that didn't last long but we truly appreciate your congratulation. It means a lot. Hopefully you enjoyed the game! :D

content: Great game here! Every choice feels like it matters. I find myself losing and thinking "Ah, I should've done [this] instead of [that] a few moves ago!" The different abilities of the knights are done well, as every member of my team feels useful and important. There's a great integration of the characters influencing events, as well. It's always interesting to see a new option appear when a certain character is in my party. Plenty of replayability here, and addicting combat. Well done!
replyContent: Thank you for the great review. I'm really glad to hear that you enjoyed the game. And your detailed review is pretty useful because we learned a lot from it about what is the game's strength and the way we should go. We hope you will like our latest update. Have a great day!

content: Absolutely amazing game, really been enjoying sneaking this in at work üòÅ my only gripe with it has been the "boss" fights you can get through the game (not the towers the creature ones) they are way too hard, I find the giant almost impossible to beat and I've tried so many times :( not letting that take away the fact this game is definitely worth the buy though
replyContent: Thank you for playing and giving us useful information. We looked into the play logs and found out the Giant King is too hard for some players. So we nerfed that slightly. And added a new useful character on the latest update. Hopefully, you like it. Have a great day! :)

content: Rogue like, your gonna die alot
Great replayability, different build styles and fun combat.
No IAP. Solid little roguelike but 5 stars always for a real game without IAP

Really enjoying this so far, I've made it to the last Boss but got crushed. There is something strangely addicting about this and I enjoy the randomness of each adventure. It's fun trying out different group make ups and strategies. I'm still trying to figure out what works best. Anyways, for the devs: "Taylor" should be "Tailor" and "Minner" should be "Miner" but I'm sure some other nerd like myself has already told you :)
replyContent: Thank you for the great feedback and report. We fixed the typos in the latest version. It's always good to meet a nice player like you. Have a great day!

content: Great rogue-lite with fun mechanics and a good challenge that feels rewarding when you do manage to beat it
Tedious drivel, almost lost the will to live starting to play this, unistalled

Only an hour into it but it's got an interesting set of mechanics and I really like the aesthetic. Hoping more depth comes along with progression (more buttons to press/tactical positioning) and would quite like a way to cut short an ill-fated run, but happy to give 5 on first impressions. Worth a try! No ads or IAP. Edit: found how to finish a run, in pause menu.

I didn't expect to like it as much as I do now. I was truly facing the unknown and didn't even know if I will waste money or not but boy it was worth it to try it out and I am so glad to have found this gem of a game.
I love your app, its really fun yet challenging
So many punishment for so little rewards. Game is repetitive. Not fun to play at all.
replyContent: I'm sorry you feel that way. :( If you're experiencing any other issues with the game please email us at teamarex0help@teamarex.com. We wish the game to satisfy everyone but it isn't easy. Thank you for playing.

content: An amazing game, sequel please! After dumping weeks of my life into this game, I have finally finished it 100% My life now has no meaning until more content comes out.
replyContent: Wow, thank you for the amazing review. :D We'll keep updating the game with more content. Please enjoy!

content: Excellent game I have no issue with it. it's hard to find good mobile games especially advertised on on facebook the ad displayed real gameplay and the gameplay is well explained and easy
replyContent: Glad to hear that you enjoyed the game! :D The ad we made is comprised of actual gameplay footage because we wanted to be honest to gamers as an indie game studio. (There was nothing else we could do) And most of the issues are fixed on the latest version. Thank you for playing and leaving the positive review.

content: This game is brilliant and I couldn't reccomend it enough. I've never written a review before but I purchased this game 3 hours ago and haven't put it down since. I'm excited to see new content and hope everyone can get around to support the developers.
replyContent: Nice to hear that you liked the game! Please tell your friends about it. That will be a great help because we're now really struggling to let gamers know about our game. And what we are preparing is a new character update. Thank you for playing and leaving the positive review! :)

content: Game will not load. Have tried fix below but app still will not load. Goes through loading 0% to 99% then crashes on "initializing" every time.
replyContent: We checked your phone model and found out the device has only 1GB RAM. (Motorola moto e5 play Go) The phone is below the minimum system requirements. The game needs at least 2GB RAM. For example, Galaxy S4 has 2GB. Please email us at teamarex0help@gmail.com. We'll help you refund the game through google play. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience

content: The game is great and worth every penny. The only thing I have started to encounter the storage permission issue after reinstalling the app on my Note 10+. It doesn't go past the loading screen which freezes.
replyContent: We're deeply sorry about the inconvenience. Please try this: Go to [Android Settings Menu] - [Apps] - [Unknown Knights] - [Permissions] and turn On the Permission of [Storage]. If it doesn't work, please email us at teamarex0help@gmail.com with more details so that we can support you. We'll fix the issue soon. Thank you for playing!

content: Edit: The game team responded to my problem half a day after i raised it and now i can play the game. Nice one! Will come back once i played with it some more
replyContent: Sorry for the inconvenience. We found that the version of your game is not updated. (The latest version is 2.382 but your current version is 2.221) Please update the game to the latest version and retry it. If it still doesn't work after updating, please email us at teamarex0help@gmail.com with more details. Thank you! *Hope you'll like the game!

content: Great game over all. Read the prior reviews and glad to see they weren't kidding. I can see myself getting burnt out of this game here in the next few days. So here I be hoping your team the best because I'd love to see your game, and future games, succeed. Keep up the awesome work. Ps. Meant to add the fact that I'm looking foward to possible future content to the game to combat the burn out of playing the game. Cheers!
replyContent: Thank you for the great review! :) We're happy to hear that you liked our game. For indie studios, it's really hard to get a second chance to make another game but we're doing our best to survive and succeed. If you liked the game, please tell your friends and let others know about the game. It would be a great help to us. *We'll keep updating! :D

content: A great game for a decent price! Two question tho: there a discord server for Unknown knights and is there somewhere i can send typos/bugs to? A very good game that is a very fun and rewarding challenge, unlike other mobile games... Its so good to see a beautiful gem amongst the rough! Keep it up
replyContent: Thank you for playing and the kind words! We really appreciate it. and yes, that's our official discord channel if you found that in the game. Feel free to send any message to us. :)

content: This game is so amazing I just bought and I must say I'm very excited about this game and what it has to offer I wish there were more RPG games that are like this ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
replyContent: Thank you for playing and the positive feedback! Please enjoy the game, we'll keep updating it with more content. :)

content: Great game but i cant beat last final fight on expert mode :(
Looks cool, but it seems to keep freezing at the intro screen whenever I start it up on my s7 Update: Got it working and the game is great, thanks!
replyContent: Glad to hear that we fixed the issue! Please enjoy the game, and thank you for the feedback.

content: Got this game from a Facebook advert and it's the best thing I've ever done on my phone it's amazing game play and the time to get really into it was easy within 10 minutes I was hooked
replyContent: Thank you for the positive feedback and the compliment! We're now preparing a new update with a character. We hope you'll like it!

content: Great. 5 out of 5. Highly recommend.
replyContent: Thank you for the positive comment! :D Please keep enjoying the game. We'll keep updating it!

content: Wonderful, away from my usual pc and games I love playing this game while on the move, great art great feeling of achievement and makes me want to keep playing, thanks for this gem of a game!
replyContent: Thank you for playing and giving us a wonderful review! Please keep enjoying the game and let your friends know about it if you liked. That would give us more energy to update new content. We're now preparing an update with a new character. Hopefully, you'll like it.

content: This game gave me FTL flashbacks. It's so good and so rich, combat is easy to learn but punishing if you decide to relax, the story is great and at one point 2 of my knights started talking together. Imma just be real, this game is worth the amount I paid anyday!
replyContent: Thank you for the great review and uplifting words! It's nice to hear that you enjoyed the game. :) We're big fans of FTL as well so we wanted to make players have the feeling. Please keep enjoying the game, and if you can, tell your friends about the game. We'll keep updating with more content.

content: You had me at no ads or in app purchases. I wish there were a lot more newer games like this. (Saw this on reddit)
replyContent: Thank you for playing and kind words! Please tell your friends about the game if you like it. It will be greatly helpful to us :D

content: At first i thought this game was a rip off with the price, but it has proven to be quite the gem in the sea of trash called the google play store. The only issue i had was when i attempted to revive a knight with the hourglass in my inventory, this lead to the language turning into korean and me being unable to revive them.
replyContent: Thank you for playing and the positive feedback. It really means a lot to us and we appreciate it. We tested the bug you mentioned under the same conditions but in our test environment, the issue did not occur. If it happens again, please email us with a screenshot. (teamarex0help@gmail.com) We're sorry for the inconvenience.

content: Excellent challenging roguelite. Looking forward to more content!
replyContent: Thank you for playing and giving a positive comment! The issue you mentioned is fixed now. We're deeply sorry for your inconvenience. And yes, we'll keep updating more content! :)

content: I absolutely loved this game! Loved the combat mechanics and art style. Procedurally generated and perfect amount of difficulty. I beat it on normal on my third attempt but I had sunk 3.5 hours on it üò≠. Did it all in one time and it didn't even feel that long, I thought maybe an hour had past. Even though I beat it once there is still more new enemies I haven't faced and still more story I have to discover as well as side quests I missed. Not to mention I need to try out hard mode. Sequel pls!
replyContent: Thank you for the positive and helpful review! :D We're really happy to hear that you liked playing Unknown Knights. Please let others know about the game. Because as a small indie studio, there's nothing much we can do in terms of promotion. We can't afford to make a sequel for now but we want to do that! Happy new year and thank you again!

content: Great Dungeon Crawler.
replyContent: Wow, thank you for playing! :)

content: Good. It's a nice game for commuting. I've played and finished once but I could see myself giving it another run through. Just keep updating.
replyContent: Please keep enjoying the game. We prepared a lot of replay values and unlockable bonuses. Thank you for playing!

content: It's something like FTL, except the theme. Battles are challenging but well balanced. I would definitely try a second run. Seems like it has a lot of replay value.
replyContent: Thank you for playing and positive feedback. We hope you enjoy the second run as well!

content: Great game. It's challenging but enjoyable. Loved the theme especially the music. Very worth it so far.
replyContent: Thank you for the positive comment! We'll keep updating the game with more characters and content. :)
